```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(KMsurv)
library(survival)
library(survminer)
data(burn)
```


```{r}
burn.surv <- Surv(time = burn$T3, event = burn$D3)
ggsurvplot(survfit(burn.surv ~ 1), surv.median.line="hv", data = burn, xlab = "Time (Days)", ylab = "Survival Probability", title = "Kaplan Meier Estimate of Time to Staphylococcus Aureus Infection")
```
